title: Bug 121687: Exception throws when exporting data in a table inside a grid cell.
OB: When trying to export data in a table that is inside a grid cell, an exception is thrown.
EB: The software should allow exporting data from tables within grid cells without throwing any exceptions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Insert a grid. 
2. Insert a table into one grid cell. 
3. Insert another table into the other grid cell.
